alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued October 01 at 8:06PM EDT until October 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Watch, 2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the beaches, Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the beaches, Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks, and Ocracoke Island. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in some areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront threatening some homes and businesses. Numerous road closures and flooding of vehicles will be possible. Ocean overwash impacting portions of Highway 12 will also be possible on Hatteras and Ocracoke Islands, especially where dune structures are vulnerable. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Duck NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 2.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/01 AM 4.7 1.0 1.7 4 None 02/01 PM 5.9 2.2 1.8 3 Minor 03/02 AM 5.6 1.9 2.6 3-4 Minor 03/02 PM 7.5 3.8 3.5 8-10 Major 04/03 AM 7.1 3.4 4.1 10 Major Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/01 AM 3.0 2.4 2.3 1 Minor 02/02 PM 2.9 2.3 2.0 1 None 03/02 AM 2.8 2.2 2.1 1 None 03/02 PM 3.2 2.6 2.4 2 Minor 04/02 AM 3.1 2.5 2.5 1 Minor Ocracoke Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.9 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/12 AM 2.8 1.7 2.0 1 None 02/03 PM 2.9 1.8 1.9 1 None 03/02 AM 2.9 1.8 2.1 1 None 03/03 PM 3.6 2.5 2.5 2-3 Minor 04/03 AM 3.6 2.5 2.8 2 Minor Coast Guard Hatteras NC MLLW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 4.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/11 PM 2.6 1.4 1.9 1 Minor 02/01 PM 2.5 1.3 1.5 1 Minor 03/02 AM 2.8 1.6 2.0 1 Minor 03/05 PM 3.2 2.0 2.4 3 Minor 04/03 AM 3.6 2.4 2.8 2-3 Moderate 04/01 PM 3.7 2.5 3.0 2 Moderate &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island
